fields.title: Junior Software Developer (Internship)
fields.description: Collaborating on software development projects with a focus on backend web development. Building and maintaining applications using Python (Django), C#, and PostgreSQL. Applying best practices in Git version control, debugging, and testing. Learning and contributing to real-world enterprise systems in a team environment.

fields.title: Software Developer
fields.description: Developed and maintained web applications for various clients. Specialized in creating responsive front-end interfaces and robust back-end systems using Django and modern web technologies. Managed projects end-to-end, from conception to deployment, ensuring timely delivery and client satisfaction.
